title: List of Omega Psi Phi brothers
data: Founder . Was a pioneering African-American biologist , academic and science writer
12th Administrator of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration ( NASA ) and 1st African American to lead NASA 's Discovery joint space venture with the Soviets
Astronaut ( perished in the Space Shuttle Challenger disaster in 1986 ) ; Laser Physicist ; member of the Bahá ' í Faith

Entomologist . In group of 13 members that were first international members of the fraternity , in newly established Sigma chapter at McGill University in Montreal , Quebec , Canada . ( The chapter later moved to Michigan State University . )
Responsible for the single most important significant medical event with the creation of blood/plasma separation . This process has saved millions of lives in times of peace and war
As the first African American to earn a Ph.D in anthropology , President of the NAACP from 1976 to 1982 . Founder of Kappa Psi Chapter
Nuclear engineer at Massachusetts Institute of Technology , Deputy Undersecretary of Defense under George W. Bush
American research chemist and a pioneer in the chemical synthesis of medicinal drugs from plants
intro: This is a list of notable members of Omega Psi Phi fraternity (ΩΨΦ) which was founded on November 17, 1911, at Howard University.
